vsParam: Um? New notice on the bulletin board!

Er...
"Please do not challenge monsters stronger than you"?

That's pretty self-evident.
Did something happen?

Yeah, I heard that some students went to challenge
monsters in the dangerous zones for quick upgrades, and ended up hurting themselves.

Although the Student Union did carefully evaluated
the information provided by Totori when it decided to
set up the Adventurer System...

Ah! Maybe those students went to places marked by
Totori as "Danger, Keep Out" on the map!?

How could this be... I shouldn't have added all
those redundant information on the map...

It's not your fault, Totori. Those who ignored the
warnings should be the ones to blame!

In Arland, the system doesn't allow you to undertake
commissions higher than your own level.

So this kind of situation of going to dangerous zones
rashly rarely happens... But...

You are not thinking about doing something
dangerous, are you?
Your trouble is also our trouble!

Uh, [px]!?
W, why do you think so?ã€€

We see it right through your eyes! You plan to fight
the dangerous monster yourself, don't you?

*Boo-hoo*...
That may be a little reckless, but I am responsible...

Let's go together
and strike it down!
Let's work as team! You wouldn't mind, would you?

Guys... Thank you!
I really appreciate that!

Okay!
Let's stick to the plan, and go together!

Uh? Did we make a plan?
But...

To prevent anyone else from getting hurt,
I must kill it!
We made it... It's down! We did it!

Ha ha ha ha! Our justice and friendship,
as well as Totori's strength have been proven!

Uh huh. Let aside the justice and friendship,
Totori is really reliable!

Yeah. Having the courage to challenge such a
dangerous monster, you are one step closer
to your mother.

Hee hee... I couldn't have done it without you guys!
Thank you!

But, if the Adventurer System remains unchanged,
similar problems might occur again in the future...

First of all, I must add the adventurer experience I
learnt in Arland into the system.
Oh, you are really a solo adventurer now!

Just report this incident to the Student Union.
Hazel is wise and able, she will figure out a solution.
Yes! I'll sort out all improvements need to be made.

But such a wise and able person... Came up with
something like a dating coupon all by herself...

Ah, ah ha-ha...
Just forget about it...
